code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./SignList.css';import{FaTrashAlt}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignList(){const[signs,setSigns]=useState([]);const fetchSigns=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/signs').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setSigns(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Failed to load signs:",err));};useEffect(()=>{fetchSigns();},[]);const handleDelete=className=>{if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete \"".concat(className,"\"?"))){fetch("http://localhost:5000/delete_sign/".concat(className),{method:'DELETE'}).then(res=>{if(res.ok){alert("Deleted \"".concat(className,"\""));fetchSigns();}else{res.json().then(data=>alert("Error: ".concat(data.error)));}}).catch(err=>alert('Failed to delete: '+err));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sign-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sign-list-title",children:"\uD83D\uDCD8 Saved Hand Signs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sign-grid",children:signs.map((sign,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sign-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:5000".concat(sign.image_url),alt:sign.class_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"sign-name",children:sign.class_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(sign.class_name),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTrashAlt,{})," Delete"]})]},index))})]});}export default SignList;
